q1.question: Who is brought to Mount Olympus?
q1.recall: In Greek mythology, various gods and goddesses are brought to Mount Olympus. Some of the most prominent deities who reside on Mount Olympus include Zeus, the king of the gods, Hera, his wife and queen of the gods, Poseidon, the god of the sea, Hades, the god of the underworld, Athena, the goddess of wisdom, Apollo, the god of the sun, Artemis, the goddess of the hunt, Aphrodite, the goddess of love, and many others.
q1.vectordb:
No one is brought to Mount Olympus.
SOURCES:
q1.hybrid: In Greek mythology, various gods and goddesses are brought to Mount Olympus. Some of the most prominent deities who reside on Mount Olympus include Zeus, the king of the gods, Hera, his wife and queen of the gods, Poseidon, the god of the sea, Hades, the god of the underworld, Athena, the goddess of wisdom, Apollo, the god of the sun, Artemis, the goddess of the hunt, Aphrodite, the goddess of love, and many others.
